question: I have a friend who got asthma while during the day of fasting can we take Ventoline Inhalaor will it b effect on fasting or can he allow to do that
answer:
QUESTION

i want 2 ask about if the person s Fasting nd he got asthma while during the day of fasting can we take Ventoline Inhalaor will it b effect on fasting or can he allow to do that plz

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

Since Ventolin Inhaler contains medication, it will break the fast.  If you get an asthma attack while fasting and no other alternative is available, you may take the Ventolin Inhaler and make up the fast afterwards.  There will not be any kaffārah.

(فتاوى محمودية، كتاب الصوم، باب ما يفسد الصوم وما لا يفسد: 10/154-155؛ فاروقية)

And Allah knows best

Wassalaamu `alaykum
